paper_abstract: The paper deals with the multibody system software which implements the solution of the global dynamic problem for multibody systems described by redundant coordinates (DAE equations) and with a possibility of redundant number of actuators. The aim of the global dynamics evaluation is mainly the machine synthesis. The necessity of such formulation arises especially in robotics where the accessible velocities and accelerations on the given trajectory are important for the motion planning and for the design optimization of robots and manipulators. The analogical problem can be very important also for the design of any other machine type. The developed software is therefore one of the important tools for the multiobjective machine synthesis. (C) 2013 Published by Elsevier Ltd.
paper_title: Software for global dynamics evaluation of mechanisms
